wclDescription: Try these BEGINNER level weekly challenges if you are new to exercising or need to ease back into it.
Perform these INTERMEDIATE weekly challenges with solid technique before moving on to higher levels.
Be sure to pace yourself while doing these ADVANCED weekly challenges; they are harder than they appear.
These weekly challenges are considered EXPERT level and require tremendous fitness and stamina.
Attempt these weekly challenges with extreme caution!  If you can complete these, then you are, without a doubt, a MASTER of calisthenics.
